articles.title: G.S. Kim Jong Il sends educational aid fund and stipends to Chongryon
Floral baskets to G.S. Kim Jong Il from Cambodia
articles.content:
G.S. Kim Jong Il sends educational aid fund and stipends to Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent educational aid fund and stipends of 128.8 million yen in the Japanese currency to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) for the development of democratic and national education on the occasion of Sun's Day.
   The educational aid fund and stipends sent by President Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il in 141 instalments for the children of Korean Residents in Japan amount to 43,671,483,000 yen in the Japanese currency.

articles.title: Floral basket to President Kim Il Sung's Statue from CILRECO Secretary General
articles.content:
Floral baskets to G.S. Kim Jong Il from Cambodia
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A large floral basket was sent to General Kim Jong Il by acting head of State Chea Sim on behalf of King Norodom Sihanouk and Queen Akka-Norodom Monineath Sihanouk on the occasion of Sun's Day.
   The acting head of State, the first and second prime ministers, the acting President of Parliament, a co-Minister of Defence, the Chairman of the Khmer Civilian Party and the Chairman of the Khmer Combatants Party for Mulinaka and Liberty of Cambodia sent floral baskeks to the Korean embassy in Phnom Penh.

articles.title: Gifts to G.S. Kim Jong Il from abroad
articles.content:
Floral basket to President Kim Il Sung's Statue from CILRECO Secretary General
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Guy Dupre, Secretary General of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea (CILRECO), sent a floral basket to the Statue of  President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on the occasion of Sun's Day, his birthday.
   The floral basket was laid on April 14.

articles.title: Foreigners visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Gifts to G.S. Kim Jong Il from abroad
  Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received gifts from the government of Cambodia and the Ministry of Culture of Egypt on the occasion of Sun's Day.
   The gifts were handed to Vice-Premier and Minister of Culture and the Arts Jang Chol by Cambodian government cultural delegate Nouth Narang who is Minister of Culture and Art, and Egyptian cultural delegate Hussein Abd El Moneim A. Tolba who is first deputy Minister of Culture, on a visit to Korea.

articles.title: Joint performances of Pyongyang Festival
articles.content:
Foreigners visit Mangyongdae
  Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councillors corps and foreign trade officials here visited Mangyongdae on April 14 on the occasion of Sun's Day, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   They looked round mementoes preserved at his old home in Mangyongdae.
   They had pictures taken in token of their visit to the old home and then saw revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.

articles.title: Letter to G.S. Kim Jong Il from NDFSK central committee
articles.content:
Joint performances of Pyongyang Festival 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Joint performances of the 16th April Spring Friendship Art Festival were given at theatres in Pyongyang on April 14 in the wake of separate and group performances.
   Foreign and Korean artistes put on the stage choruses, songs, dances and other colorful numbers, yearning for the sun, President Kim Il Sung.
   And they highly praised General Kim Jong Il whom all the people respect, trust and follow as the great sun of the 21st century.
   They also sang of the greatness and noble trait of mother Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine.
   The performers vividly showed aspiration of the world progressive peoples and  noble spirit, love for homeland and industrious and optimistic life of their peoples.
   A joint performance of foreign acrobats was given at the Pyongyang circus.
   Performances were appreciated by vice-presidents Ri Jong Ok, Pak Song Chol and Kim Pyong Sik and other senior officials of the party and government, overseas Koreans, foreign diplomatic envoys and embassy officials here.

articles.title: Letter to G.S. Kim Jong Il from Chongryon  CSC
articles.content:
Letter to G.S. Kim Jong Il from NDFSK central committee
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a letter from the Central Committee of the National Democratic Front of South Korea (NDFSK) on April 15, Sun's Day.
   The letter said President Kim Il Sung is the greatest leader, hero and man whom the Korean nation and humankind are deeply venerating and praising.
   He, who led the hard-fought anti-Japanese war and anti-U.S. war to victory to achieve the historic cause of national liberation and defend with honour the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation, is highly lauded as a legendary hero and an invincible and iron-willed commander, it said, and went on:
   "The people in the south who are greeting auspicious Sun's Day are very happy and honored to have you, General Kim Jong Il, who are identical to President Kim Il Sung in ideology, leadership and virtues, at the head of the nation.
   "You have wisely led the whole party, all the army and the entire people with matchless grit and will and thus checked and frustrated all the moves of the imperialists and reactionaries against the north, firmly defended the banner of socialism and highly demonstrated the great features of Juche Korea to the whole world.
   "You are the bright sun  and all people's benevolent father who exalt the feats of President Kim Il Sung for all ages  with unfailing loyalty and filial piety to him and provide the entire fellow countrymen and humankind with eternal happiness.
   "We will regard the three charters of national reunification put forward by President Kim Il Sung as the precious sword of the reunification movement and  closely unite around you. We will also make all efforts for national independence and unity, check and frustrate the moves of the separatists with positive offensive for reunification and open a new epochal phase of national reunification without fail."
   The letter wholeheartedly wished General Kim Jong Il a long life in good health.

articles.title: Congratulatory letters to G.S. Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Letter to G.S. Kim Jong Il from Chongryon  CSC
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on April 15, Sun's Day.   Generalissimo Kim Il Sung who is acclaimed for the first time in the five thousand year-long history of the Korean people is a great revolutionary, a distinguished statesman, the invincible and iron-willed commander who performed undying revolutionary feats with his gifted intelligence, distinguished leadership ability and noble virtues, and a veteran leader of the world revolution who is recognized by humankind, the letter said, and continued:
   "The Generalissimo embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years, liberated the country, breaking through all hardships, led the socialist revolution and construction to victory and opened a new history of prosperity and development of the country.
   "The Generalissimo freed Koreans in Japan from the position of a ruined nation, put them forward as full-fledged overseas citizens of Juche Korea, formed Chongryon, a product of Juche and led the movement of Koreans in Japan to victory and glory.
   "Thanks to you, respected General Kim Jong Il, the great sun, who will lead the 21st century following the 20th century, the fatherly leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the sun of Juche, is immortal and under your outstanding and tested leadership, the history of the sun continues forever with the vigorous advance of Juche Korea striking the world people with admiration.
   "You, respected General, who are shattering all the moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK and firmly defending socialism, are now wisely leading the whole party, all the army and all the people to make a new great advance in socialist economic construction  in the van of the forced march for the final victory.
   "All the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will prepare themselves better to be patriotic loyal subjects who venerate the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung as the eternal sun of Juche for all ages and absolutely trust and follow only you, respected General, and strengthen and develop Chongryon, the precious patriotic legacy of the Generalissimo into his organisation forever and into an overseas Koreans' organisation of Juche type unfailingly loyal to you, General."
   The letter wholeheartedly wished General Kim Jong Il a long life in good health.

articles.title: Meetings commemorate 86th birthday of President Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Congratulatory letters to G.S. Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il, Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), received congratulatory letters from the diplomatic corps and military attaches corps here on the occasion of Sun's Day.
   The letters were handed to Vice-Premier and Foreign Minister Kim Yong Nam and KPA Vice-Marshal Jo Myong Rok, director of the KPA General Political Department, on April 14.
   General Kim Jong Il also received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from diplomats of Cambodia, Libya, Ethiopia, India, Egypt, Vietnam, Poland, Russia, Syria and other countries and the resident representative of the United Nations Development Program and congratulatory letters and gifts from the military attaches of Vietnam, Eygpt and Iran here.

articles.title: DPRK ambassador to Bulgaria appointed
articles.content:
Meetings commemorate 86th birthday of President Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Meetings commemorating the 86th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung were held in provinces (municipalities), cities and counties (districts) on April 14.
   The reporters said that the history of the Korean revolution is precisely the sacred history of President Kim Il Sung, the great sun, who provided the country and the nation with the hope of rebirth and prosperity and built and developed a new socialist korea on the land of Juche after he rose as the sun of the revolution.
   Guided by General Kim Jong Il, the sun of the 21st century, who is identical to President Kim Il Sung in ideology, leadership, personality and virtues, the Korean people have been able to dynamically advance the revolution and construction with the conviction that the future of Kim Il Sung's nation is bright, they stressed.
   Meetings were also held at the units of the three services of the Korean people's army on the same day.

articles.title: Command post exercise to be staged
articles.content:
DPRK ambassador to Bulgaria appointed
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Man Ik was appointed Ambassador e.p. of the DPRK to Bulgaria according to a decree of the Central People's Committee of the DPRK.

articles.title: Booklet "Great Man" published in S. Korea
articles.content:
Command post exercise to be staged
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The South Korean military and the U.S. decided to stage  war manoeuvres for one week from April 23, according to  a radio report from Seoul. The command post exercise is designed for effective deployment of armed forces to be added to the U.S. aggression forces present in South Korea and the South Korea-U.S. Combined Forces in "emergency" on the Korean peninsula. 
   Involved there will be South Korean and U.S. troops, more than 7,000 in all.
   The U.S. and the South Korean puppets continue staging the war exercises, while crying for "peace" and "detente."
   The exercise to be staged after the appearance of a new regime in South Korea shows that their moves to unleash a war against the north are getting more grave.
